Cards.name: Card3
Cards.targetSpecial: If you've been good, one extra

Cards.name: Card4
Cards.attackSpecial: If your sexy, Charisma vs Fortitude

Cards.name: Channel Divinity: Divine Fortune
Cards.description: In the face of peril, you hold true to your faith and receive a special boon.

details.name: Effect
details.text: You gain a +1 bonus to your next attack roll or saving throw before the end of your next turn.

Cards.name: Channel Divinity: Turn Undead
Cards.description: You sear undead foes, push them back, and root them in place.

details.name: Hit
details.text: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and you push the target a number of squares equal to 3 + your Charisma modifier. The target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.
Increase damage to 2d10 + Wisdom modifier at 5th level, 3d10 + Wisdom modifier at 11th level, 4d10 + Wisdom modifier at 15th level, 5d10 + Wisdom modifier at 21st

details.name: Miss
details.text: Half damage, and the target is not pushed or immobilized.

Cards.name: Healing Word
Cards.description: You whisper a brief prayer as divine light washes over your target, helping to mend its wounds.
Cards.frequencySpecial: You can use this power twice per encounter, but only once per round. At 16th level, you can use this power three times per encounter.

details.name: Effect
details.text: The target can spend a healing surge and regain an additional 1d6 hit points.
Increase the amount of additional hit points regained to 2d6 at 6th level, 3d6 at 11th level, 4d6 at 16th level, 5d6 at 21st level, and 6d6 at 26th level.

Cards.name: Lance of Faith
Cards.description: A brilliant ray of light sears your foe with golden radiance. Sparkles of light linger around the target, guiding your allyâ€™s attack.

details.name: Hit
details.text: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier radiant damage, and one ally you can see gains a +2 power bonus to his or her next attack roll against the target.
Increase damage to 2d8 + Wisdom modifier at 21st level.
